title: Konyaki-haki sarete Me ga Samemashita - Novel Updates
tags: Broken Engagement   Childhood Friends   Cute Story   Female Protagonist   Heartwarming   Marriage   Oneshot   Otome Game   Reincarnated in a Game World   Villainess Noble Girls
author: Sugawara Toshi   菅原とし
description: The Crown Prince tells Shiris that he wants to break off his engagement with her. In that instant, she remembers everything. This whole world was a otome game. Now with the engagement broken what will Shiris do next?>
